ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: Functions to support the computations carried out in `An Introduction to Statistical Modeling of Extreme Values' by Stuart Coles. The functions may be divided into the following  groups; maxima/minima, order statistics, peaks over thresholds and point processes.

Functions to support the computations carried out in `An Introduction to Statistical Modeling of Extreme Values' by Stuart Coles. The functions may be divided into the following  groups; maxima/minima, order statistics, peaks over thresholds and point processes.

name: r-ismev
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.43" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-ismev
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/ismev_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/ismev/ismev_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b2b7ddaed7994a4efd92a215ba90da7bdb63ccdcc3ebd26ffd4f476211e9c336

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:

  host:
    - r-base
    - r-mgcv
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-mgcv

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('ismev')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('ismev')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.ral.ucar.edu/~ericg/softextreme.php
  license: GPL (>= 2)
  summary: 'Functions to support the computations carried out in `An Introduction to Statistical Modeling of Extreme Values'' by Stuart Coles. The functions may be divided into the following  groups; maxima/minima, order statistics, peaks over thresholds and point processes.  '
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: ismev
# Version: 1.42
# Date: 2018-05-08
# Title: An Introduction to Statistical Modeling of Extreme Values
# Author: Original S functions written by Janet E. Heffernan with R port and R  documentation provided by Alec G. Stephenson.
# Maintainer: Eric Gilleland <ericg@ucar.edu>
# Depends: R (>= 2.10.0), mgcv
# Description: Functions to support the computations carried out in `An Introduction to Statistical Modeling of Extreme Values' by Stuart Coles. The functions may be divided into the following  groups; maxima/minima, order statistics, peaks over thresholds and point processes.
# License: GPL (>= 2)
# URL: http://www.ral.ucar.edu/~ericg/softextreme.php
# Packaged: 2018-05-08 20:56:39 UTC; ericg
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Repository: CRAN
# Date/Publication: 2018-05-10 22:08:29 UTC
